entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending near noon then clearing. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CDT Friday 17 March 2023
